channel.title: User Centricity Award, 2019 on Supriya Dutta

item.title: Zuci - A Phy-gital multiplayer turn based strategy game
item.description: Overview BACKGROUND Folk musical instruments bind oneâ€™s community together. Each instrument has a certain role, location, and time to be performed within a community. The audience for traditional folk musical instruments has, however, shrunk significantly as modern electronic musical instruments and music have become more widely accepted. OBJECTIVE The main goal of this project was to teach participants about folk musical instruments through their sounds, method of construction, relationship with different communities and their festivals
